nodes.text: Holo-Gaftikar Channel Ten was one of the primary news-reporting agencies based on the planet Gaftikar during the Clone Wars. Headquartered in Eyat, the Channel Ten Tower was one of the Grand Army of the Republic's main targets during the occupation of Gaftikar.

Sergeant Tel and Omega Squad infiltrated the facility to find it still broadcasting. The building was set to detonate upon a door-breach; the Republic troops tried to evacuate in time, but several members of the group were injured when the facility exploded.
